name: Space Farmer (KarstenPedersen)
description:
You farm trees and sell them to earn money. You use your money to pay rent. The mafia might also visit you so its good to have some money on you.

Be careful. There are lightnings that can burn down your trees. 

You can level up. You create a magic orb every time you level up. The magic orb is a power-up. You can also buy new land, o you can farm more trees.

Controls:

WASD = Movement. E = pickup. RMB = plant sapling. LMB = attack and use tool
